name: Gladius
body:
## 3.0.8 Release
- Fixed a bug which crashed Tags moduel after you switched profiles.
- Test function updates.
- Some GUI changes and bugfixes.
- German localization updates.
- Library updates.
- Other minor fixes.

## 3.0.7 Release
- Removed Global Templates.

## 3.0.6 Release
- Updated for 5.4.
- Fixed a bug with the Tags module.
- Added Monk "Resuscitate" spell to the Announces module.

## 3.0.5 Release
- Fixed a bug with the Auras module. 

## 3.0.4 Release
- Fixed a bug with enable/disable Auras module functionality.
- Fixed a bug with enable/disable Buffs button's functionality.
- Fixed a bug with enable/disable Debuffs button's functionality.
- Reduced maxium buffs/debuffs to show to 10.
- Aura module improvements.
- Localization updates.
- Other minor fixes. 

## 3.0.3 Release
- Fixed a bug with the Auras module.
- Other minor fixes. 

## 3.0.2 Release
- Fixed a bug which created invisible but clickable frames outside arenas.
- Disabled test button functionality inside arenas.
- Fixed a type which didn't let "Layouts" module to load properly.
- xCT and xCT+ support fix.
- Library updates.
- Some other smaller fixes.
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.1 Release
- Tagging as release.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 6
- Added zhCN and zhTW localizations.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 5
- DRTracker fixes.
- Healthbar fixes.
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 4
- Aura updates.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 3
- Lib updates.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 2
- Added support for xCT and xCT+.
- Added Korean localizations.
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.1 Alpha 1
- Code cleanup.

## 3.0.0 Release
- Updated for 5.2.
- Spell updates.
- Library updates.
- Minor bug fixes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
